title: Fears Idlib attacks leave Syrians with nowhere to run
text:
A covert Russian mission in Syria uncovered Wednesday, April 25, 2018 - 01:59
Reuters has witnessed on three occasions men flying from Damascus into Russia and being transported to a Russian military base, despite claims by the Kremlin it has nothing to do with private Russian citizens involved in fighting in Syria. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Reuters has witnessed on three occasions men flying from Damascus into Russia and being transported to a Russian military base, despite claims by the Kremlin it has nothing to do with private Russian citizens involved in fighting in Syria.
